title: Seared salmon with asparagus salsa
description: This light and fresh recipe is low calorie, but full of flavour.Each serving provides 243kcal, 19g protein, 6.5g carbohydrate (of which 6g sugars), 15g fat (of which 3g saturates), 3g fibre and 2.5g salt.
ingredients: 320g/11oz fresh salmon fillet, skin removed, cut in half lengthways
1 bunch English asparagus, woody ends removed
½ red chilli, seeds removed, cut into small thin strips
½ cucumber, peeled and seeds removed, cut into 1cm/½in cubes
3 heirloom tomatoes, skinned and seeds removed, cut into 1cm/½in cubes
½ lime, peeled, pith removed, finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
